Traubs_HH_n_Gate Class Reference

#include <TraubsHHNeuron.h>

Inheritance diagram for Traubs_HH_n_Gate:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

n gate for Traub's modified fast HH potassium (K) channel

See Traubs_HH_K_Channel

alpha_n = 0.032 * (15-v2) / ( exp((15-v2)/5) - 1) beta_n = 0.5 * exp((10-v2)/40)
